have a bearing on: If something has a bearing on a situation or event, it is relevant to it.
run against: If you run against someone or something, you struggle against and compete with them.
prior to: If something happens prior to a particular time or event, it happens before that time or event.
correspond to: If one thing corresponds to another, there is a close similarity or connection between them. You can also say that two things correspond.
take sides: When you take sides  , you decide to choose one side of opposing parties.
keep track of: If you keep track of a situation or a person, you make sure that you have the newest and most accurate information about them all the time.
stem from: If a condition or problem stems from something, it was caused originally by that thing.
